src:
Viral Penumpang Pesawat Jorok, Netizen Fokus ke Jempol Kaki
04 Nov 2019, 13:15 by Kris Fathoni W


Ilustrasi pesawat. (Foto: iStock)

Jakarta - Foto seorang penumpang pesawat sedang viral karena tingkah lakunya yang tak pantas dan cenderung jorok. Netizen juga ramai-ramai mengomentari jempol kakinya.Aksi jorok penumpang ini dibagikan akun Instagram PassengerShaming dalam sebuah postingannya. Foto ini memperlihatkan si penumpang sedang duduk di kursi pesawat seraya mengangkat kedua kakinya ke atas kursi di depannya.Tindakan ini bukan cuma tidak sopan tapi juga menjadi terlihat amat jorok karena si penumpang bersangkutan melakukannya dengan bertelanjang kaki. Untungnya, foto ini memperlihatkan kursi di depannya tak sedang diduduki penumpang lain.Perilaku penumpang ini kian tampak tidak mengenakkan karena tangan kirinya terlihat sedang menggaruk-garuk salah satu jempol kakinya yang sedang bersandar di kursi depan tersebut.Apa yang dilakukan oleh penumpang ini sontak mengundang komentar dalam kolom postingan foto tersebut. Selain mencela tindakan penumpang tersebut, banyak pula yang jadi fokus ke bentuk kakinya.

[Gambas:Instagram]

"Ini benar-benar buruk. Kaki itu jelek sekali!" demikian seorang netizen berkomentar.Warganet lain tak mau kalah dan menulis, "Itu kaki orang gua di film kartun. Lebih baik kaki seperti itu ditaruh saja di lantai dan ditutupi.""Ya Tuhan, apa yang terjadi dengan jempol kaki itu??" kata sebuah akun.Sejumlah akun lain tak mau kalah ikutan mengomentari jempol kaki si penumpang jorok. "Aku bakalan dapat mimpi buruk akibat jempol kaki raksasa itu."Simak Video " Tiket Pesawat Mahal, Penumpang di Bandara Kualanamu Menurun"[Gambas:Video 20detik](krs/sym)
text:
Viral Passenger Dirty Plane, Netizens Focus on the Big Toe
Nov 04 2019, 13:15 by Kris Fathoni W


Illustration of a plane. (Photo: iStock)

Jakarta - A photo of an airplane passenger is being viral because of his behavior which is inappropriate and tends to be dirty. Netizens are also busy commenting on the big toe. This dirty passenger action is shared by PassengerShaming's Instagram account in a post. This photo shows the passenger sitting in an airplane seat while lifting both of his feet onto the seat in front of him. This action is not only impolite but also looks very dirty because the passenger concerned is doing it barefoot. Fortunately, this photo shows the seat in front of him not being occupied by other passengers. The behavior of this passenger is increasingly looking uncomfortable because his left hand is seen scratching one of his big toes resting on the front seat. What this passenger is doing is suddenly inviting comments in the photo posting column. In addition to denouncing the actions of these passengers, many also focus on the shape of their feet.

[Gambas: Instagram]

"This is really bad. Those legs are so ugly!" a netizen commented. Another citizen did not want to lose and wrote, "That's the legs of a cave person in a cartoon movie. It's better to have those feet on the floor and cover them up." "My God, what happened to the big toe ??" said an account. A number of other accounts did not want to be outraged by commenting on the dirty toe of the passenger. "I'm going to have a nightmare due to the giant big toe." Watch Video "Expensive Flight Tickets, Passengers at Kualanamu Airport Declining" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (krs / sym)
